import React, { useState }from 'react' import trash from '../../img/trash.svg' import './OrderItem.css' function OrderItem ({item, price, id, deleteItem, addQuantity, totalp}) { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(4) return(

{item}

{quantity}

${price}.00

${totalp}.00

deleteItem(id)} />
) } export default OrderItem
